rules_text:
When Ulvenwald Ranger enters, surveil 2. [i](Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)[/i]
{1}{G}: Transform Ulvenwald Ranger. Activate only if it's attacking.
rules_text2:
You may look at the top card of your library any time.
You may play lands and cast creature spells from the top of your library.
At the beginning of your end step, if Ulvenwald Howler didn't attack this turn, transform it.
